name: Coop Defence
description:
A single-player game for visually impaired people that enables both abled and visually impaired people to share their experiences after playing in an equal footing.

Headphones required! Use the mouse to turn left and right and carefully listen to the rustling of bushes, the splashing of the water, etc as they move in closer.

Left Click to throw an egg at them and send them running away in terror. 

Accuracy is everything. Once you fire half a dozen eggs, the chicken re-lays the eggs.
